character.name: Rika
character.desc:
<c=db9b79>RIKA</c> 
Rika is a pilot. Their cards are based around <c=keyword>on draw</c> effects and <c=keyword>movement</c>.

RikaFlux.name: Shield Flow
RikaFlux.desc: Gain <c=keyword>{0}</c> <c=status>shield</c> when you attack. <c=downside>Lose this at the end of your turn.</c>

RikaEnergy.name: Rika Energy
RikaEnergy.desc: Spend this status first before spending <c=energy>energy</c> on <c=db9b79>Rika</c> cards.

BackUpShield.name: Back Up Shield
BackUpShield.desc: Upon losing hull, <c=downside>immidently lose this status</c> and gain twice that much in <c=status>temp shield</c> (<c=keyword>{0}</c>).
BackUpShield.shipdesc: Upon losing hull, <c=downside>immidently lose this status</c> and gain twice that much in <c=status>temp shield.

RikaFlightDraw.name: Flight Draw
RikaFlightDraw.desc: Draw {0} cards when you move. <c=downside>Lose this status at the end of your turn.</c>

Kiteing.name: Kiteing
Kiteing.desc: Attack for <c=keyword>{0}</c> damage each time you move, but if you have strafe, this damage is added to strafe's attack instead. <c=downside>Lose this status at the end of your turn.</c>

TempStrafe.name: Temp Strafe
TempStrafe.desc: Fire for <c=keyword>{0}</c> damage immediately after each move you make. <c=downside>Lose this status at the end of your turn.</c>

SpicyBoost.name: SPICY BOOST
SpicyBoost.desc: When you lose hull, gain <c=status>BOOST</c> equal to the amount of hull you lost.

CardRotate.name: CARD ROTATE
CardRotate.desc: At the start of your turn, discard 2 random cards then draw 2 cards.

RandomUSB.name: SKETCHY USB
RandomUSB.alphadesc: Upon gaining this artifact, gain 1 non-temp <c=card>Safety Override</c> & have the choice to add one of 5 <c=f00707>Rika</c> cards to your deck.
RandomUSB.desc: A random USB that will add a non-temp <c=card>Safety Override</c> & gives you the oppurtunity to add one of 5 <c=db9b79>Rika</c> cards to your deck.

SpareStatus.name: SPARE STATUS
SpareStatus.desc: At the start of each turn, gain 1 random positive or neutral <c=status>status</c> condition.

MoralBoost.name: MAGIC RAINBOW CARDSLEEVES
MoralBoost.desc: Gain 1 <c=status>BOOST</c> at the start of each of your turns.

BoostedDeck.name: BOOSTED DECK
BoostedDeck.desc: Gain 1 <c=status>BOOST</c> whenever you shuffle your deck.
